programme.title: Hunting Nazi Treasure

programme.desc: Following the strategic Union win at Antietam, Federal forces clash with a massive rebel army in the town of Fredericksburg, Virginia in what will become the largest fight of the Civil War.(n)

programme.title: Blood and Fury: America's Civil War
programme.desc: In a daring attempt to regain the upper hand in the Civil War, Confederate forces try to retake the city of Nashville and sever the supply line that's feeding the Union invasion of the south.(n)

programme.title: Apocalypse: Stalin
programme.desc: In 1941, Hitler has thrown himself into a fight to the death against Stalin. Two decades earlier, in 1917, Joseph Jughashvili from Georgia is a member of Lenin's Bolshevik Party, who has just seized power in Russia. The country is torn by civil war.(n)

programme.title: Apocalypse: Stalin
programme.desc: After blocking the Germans right outside of Moscow, Stalin now faces Hitler's second assault. The world's fate will be decided in Stalingrad. Like in Leningrad, men, women, and children are plunged into hell and sacrificed.(n)

programme.title: Apocalypse: Stalin
programme.desc: The Soviets continue on the path to towards liberation. On the road to Berlin, they discover the horror of Hitler's extermination camps. Fifteen years earlier, Stalin transformed his country using every means at his disposal.(n)

programme.title: Project Nazi: The Blueprints of Evil
programme.desc: Hitler's mastery of propaganda, and instinct for effective design, used to create everything from the swastika flag to the striking uniforms of the storm troopers, help win huge support for the Nazi party, a vital step in its march towards total power.(n)

programme.title: Project Nazi: The Blueprints of Evil

programme.sub-title: Billy the Kid: The Phantom of Lincoln County
programme.desc: On a bloodstained frontier where corruption is king, an unlikely hero becomes a crusader for justice and revenge. By the time of his death at the age of 21, everyone in the country had heard of Billy the Kid.(n)

programme.title: Gunslingers
programme.sub-title: Jesse James: The South's Last Rebel
programme.desc: The life and exploits of outlaw Jesse James are recounted.(n)

programme.title: Gunslingers
programme.sub-title: John Wesley Hardin: The Dark Heart of Texas
programme.desc: In the turbulent aftermath of the Civil War, a volatile gunman wages a bloody crusade against anyone who stands between himself and his notions of freedom.(n)

programme.title: Gunslingers
programme.sub-title: Wild Bill: Marksman and Marked Man
programme.desc: When the most famous man in the Old West outlives his legend, he becomes the target of gunslingers eager to make legends of their own by shooting him dead.(n)

programme.title: Shadow Ops
programme.desc: KGB Colonel turned double agent Oleg Gordievsky has spent ten years spying for Britain's secret service, MI6. Now the Soviets are on to him. His only hope for survival is to attempt a daring exfiltration plan.(n)

programme.title: Shadow Ops
programme.desc: Vladimir Vetrov was a top KGB spy until he betrayed his country and became a secret agent for the West. Codenamed 'Farewell' he would become America's single greatest asset in the US-Soviet spy war.(n)

programme.title: Shadow Ops
programme.desc: Martha Peterson is a CIA secret weapon, operating as a woman in the man's world of espionage in Cold War Moscow. TRIGON is a KGB turncoat, ready to hand over top secret intelligence to bring down the Soviet Union from within.(n)

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: A look at the once all-powerful Mussolini, friend of the Fuhrer, who ended his days hanging upside down like a grotesque animal carcass in Milan's Piazzale Loreto.(n)

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: The crimes perpetrated in the name of Communism remain largely unexplored. Millions of people died in a secret war with the West. Hear the extraordinary story of the Bulgarian secret department called Service Seven (a killer force operating worldwide).(n)

programme.title: Chasing Conspiracies
programme.desc: Examine some of the common conspiracy theories surrounding Hollywood. Suspicions about the activities of the Church of Scientology and the hacking of Sony Pictures are amongst the topics discussed.(n)

programme.title: Chasing Conspiracies
programme.desc: Examine some of the most famous cases of disappearances that have gone on to spawn conspiracy theories to explain them. John Bingham, 7th Earl of Lucan, union leader Jimmy Hoffa and Robert Maxwell come under discussion.(n)

programme.title: Chasing Conspiracies
programme.desc: The final edition of the series examines a range of conspiracy theories relating to extra-terrestrials. There are those who believe that we have already made contact with aliens and that world governments are concealing this.(n)

programme.title: UFOs: Uncovering the Truth
programme.desc: There are mysterious reports coming out of Area 52, including vanishing aircraft, UFOs, and revere engineering of highly advanced technology that have convinced investigators that the military knows more about alien visitation than they will say.(n)

programme.title: The UFO Cover-Up
programme.desc: Discover the truth behind the UFO cover-up. There may be a hidden 'shadow government' which guards the truth, a Nazi flying saucer could have crashed in New Mexico, aliens could live in Area 51, or these could be rumors to hide the real story.(n)

programme.title: Alcatraz: Beyond the Rock
programme.desc: The world's most famous prison holds many secrets. We'll explore a conspiracy that helped three inmates escape, reveal the truth behind the dungeon of Alcatraz, and discover the remnants of a mysterious military outpost with links to Abraham Lincoln.(n)

programme.title: America's Hidden Bunkers
programme.desc: Discover the real story behind America's secret bunkers. Ranging from backyard boxes to government mini-cities, underground bunkers have been a feature of warfare planning since the dawn of time. They have played an important role in America's history.(n)

programme.title: Brothels That Built America
programme.desc: Discover the real story behind one of society's most clandestine institutions, brothels. Hidden within these bordellos are secrets about famous patrons, governments, and even religion. Explore why these dens have endured for thousands of years.(n)

programme.title: Freemasons: National Treasure Decoded
programme.desc: The most secret of secret societies, The Freemasons, are intertwined with American history. Most of the Founding Fathers and 14 Presidents were Freemasons. Some say Washington DC is laid out as a Masonic code. See the other secrets that have been hidden.(n)

programme.desc: Game warden Eddins assists the local police with an animal cruelty case. Game warden Richards responds to a trespassing dispute, and Game warden Roraback relocates a snapping turtle. On the coast, Game warden Bailey cracks down on fishermen.(n)

programme.desc: A detective clashes with his former military commander while investigating a murder.(n)

programme.title: The Girl With All the Gifts
programme.desc: In the future, humanity is ravaged by a fungal disease that turns humans to zombies. After their base is attacked, a teacher escapes with an infected child being studied. Along with a scientist, they must traverse the dangerous country to safety.(n)

programme.title: Beasts of the Southern Wild
programme.desc: A six-year-old girl leaves her hometown to search for her mother after her father's health crisis releases fictional creatures into the wild.(n)

programme.title: Dying Young
programme.desc: After her boyfriend betrays her, a beautiful young woman starts a new life and a new job working as a private nurse and falls in love with her patient who is suffering from leukemia.(n)

programme.title: Spartan
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent and a rookie cop search for a politician's missing daughter.(n)

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: When a ruthless sultan threatens the lives of his wife and son, a young prince is willing to go to great lengths to keep them safe. An encounter in a cave, high up in the mountain, turns him into the legendary vampire, Dracula.(n)

programme.title: Underwater
programme.desc: A deadly earthquake devastates an underwater drilling facility. To get to safety, the crew must walk across the ocean floor, under constant threat from their hostile environment.(n)

programme.title: The Good Liar
programme.desc: A conman targets a wealthy widow, but his scam turns into a game of cat and mouse.(n)

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: Amidst escalating violence in New York, a young man seeks to avenge his father's murder and restore peace to the area.(n)

programme.desc: A look at a sexual triangle between a group of students at a New England college.(n)

programme.title: Wicker Park

programme.title: Bill and Ted's Excellent Adventure
programme.desc: Two failing history students travel through time in order to meet historical figures.(n)

programme.title: He Said, She Said
programme.desc: Two reporters fall in love despite the fact that they never seem to agree about anything.(n)

programme.title: 2 Minutes of Fame

programme.title: Beyond the Sea

programme.title: The Mighty Quinn

programme.title: Lay the Favorite

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: A woman's wealthy, abusive ex commits apparent suicide, leaving his fortune to her. However, after lethal events begin to occur around her she begins to believe she is being targeted by an unseen stalker.(n)
